name: Power of The Void
description: Welcome to Hell! Can you help a little demon escape from hell and go to heaven? He does not want to torture sinners but wants to help lost souls. To do this, he will have to use the power of void and go through hell, purgatory, and paradise, to gain freedom. However, the devil does not intend to give up so simply.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 or later Processor: Intel Core i3 or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated graphics card Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated graphics card Storage: 400 MB available space
